title: Pixel USB-C Earbuds + Ring & notification volume
content:
How do I lower the Ring & Notification volume when my Pixel USB-C earbuds are plugged in without also causing the Ring & Notification volume to be lower when my earbuds are unplugged?

When my earbuds are plugged in the Ringer volume is way too loud.  However, if I lower the Ring & Notification Volume and later take out my earbuds, the Ringer volume now way too quite for me to hear when the phone is in my pocket.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
